rule: $.resource[*].google_compute_subnetwork[*].*.*.log_config !exists and (($.resource[*].google_compute_subnetwork[*].*.*.purpose does not exist ) or ($.resource[*].google_compute_subnetwork[*].*.*.purpose exists and $.resource[*].google_compute_subnetwork[*].*.*.purpose does not equal 'INTERNAL_HTTPS_LOAD_BALANCER'))
policy: GCP VPC Flow logs for the subnet is set to off
